name.ja: <ruby>楽<rt>がっ</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>き</rt></ruby>の<ruby>葬<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>奏<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>曲<rt>きょく</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your Attack Position Level 7 or higher WIND Attribute Warrior or Beast Type monster.

effect.en: The attacking monster loses ATK equal to [the attacking monster's Level] x 600 until the end of this turn.
